page.title: 17THE LEISURE SURVEY 1-16
page.content: The Leisure Survey which was carried out in Holywood acquired information relating to the activities which are at present available and also the activities which the four different age groups would like to see provided in the near future. 1-16 AGE GROUP Some of the clubs in Holywood for young people are Shell Club which has twelve to fourteen members and meets every Friday night and Bangor Road Club which meets every Saturday night. Some other clubs which meet are the Badminton club, Girls'and Boys' Brigades which meet regularly on Tuesday nights. Most children go to either Bangor or Avoniel Leisure Centres but only go sometimes as the travelling costs are high.
